title: A Guide to Git Merging and Rebasing
summary: In this post we talk about the surprisingly controversial topic of git rebasing and merging. We discuss ,erging and rebasing in turn, what they are, why you would choose one over the other, and how to go about using each of them as a tutorial.

title: Writing this Blog Part 1
summary: In the first post on this blog, I discuss why I decided to write this blog, what kind of content you might find and what I hope to do with this.

title: Writing this Blog Part 2
summary: In the second post on this blog, I expand on the why of this blog and discuss how this blog came to being, what technology choices I made and why, what my experiences were and what I learned from the experience.
